snippet: Peter Praet, a member of the European Central Bank’s executive board, heightened expectations of broad government bond purchases to stoke the economy.
abstract: Peter Praet, European Central Bank board member, says current measures to stimulate the eurozone economy may not be adequate; comments heighten expectations that central bank is moving closer to broad-based government bond purchases.
lead_paragraph: Peter Praet, a member of the European Central Bank’s executive board, heightened expectations of broad government bond purchases to stoke the economy.

headline.main: Peter Praet of E.C.B. Says More Eurozone Stimulus May Be Needed
headline.print_headline: E.C.B. Executive Says More Eurozone Stimulus May Be Needed
